verses.name: Proverbs 15:28
verses.text: The heart of the righteous studieth to answer: but the mouth of the wicked poureth out evil things.

verses.name: Proverbs 15:29
verses.text: The Lord is far from the wicked: but he heareth the prayer of the righteous.

verses.name: Proverbs 15:30
verses.text: The light of the eyes rejoiceth the heart: and a good report maketh the bones fat.

verses.name: Proverbs 15:31
verses.text: The ear that heareth the reproof of life abideth among the wise.

verses.name: Proverbs 15:32
verses.text: He that refuseth instruction despiseth his own soul: but he that heareth reproof getteth understanding.

verses.name: Proverbs 15:33
verses.text: The fear of the Lord is the instruction of wisdom; and before honour is humility.
